headline: Assessing ON Semi Shares After Q1 Guidance Cut and 20% Slide in 2025
summary: Thinking about ON Semiconductor stock? You're not the only one. Whether you're debating a buy, holding through the noise, or considering the exit ramp, this is a moment that has everyone pausing for a closer look. After years of strong gains, ON Semiconductor has faced a turbulent stretch, down nearly 20% year to date and off a hefty 36.3% over the past year. Yet, some long-term holders are still sitting on impressive profits thanks to the stock's 118.7% rise over the last five years...
